name: Feather Frenzy
description:
Feather Frenzy combines the excitement of collecting items with the challenge of avoiding obstacles!

Your goal is simple: collect feathers to increase your score and keep scoring. But be careful - one wrong move and you'll run into poop, ending your game!

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, Feather Frenzy is perfect for all ages and skill levels.
